error.title: Something went wrong
error.description: We apologize for the inconvenience. An unexpected error has occurred. Please try again or return to the home page.

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.description: Sorry, we couldn't find the page you're looking for. The page may have been moved, deleted, or the URL might be incorrect.
tips: Use the navigation menu to find what you need
Return to the home page and start fresh

globalError.title: Application Error
globalError.description: A critical error has occurred. We're sorry for the inconvenience. Please try refreshing the page or return to the home page.
